+# [Atomix][Website]

nodes.bodyText: Can't tell if it's clever to accept a format or confusing 😅
Yeah didn't wanted to rewrite the complete stuff 🤷‍♂️
So this will now call AbstractSession#decode instead of LogProxySession#decode, since LocalSession was a non-static inner class. I guess I don't understand the change here 🤔

The thing is it also called before the super but it was not explicit. If you inherit a method then you will call it before calling methods from outer scope. If you want to call LocalProxySession#decode you need to write. LocalProxySession.this.decode()
